pages.text: Rockets weren't always the space-fairing behemoths we know of today. In fact, Rocketry has very humble origins, Ancient China. The Chinese filled tubes with gunpowder (a very early iteration for fireworks). $(br2)In Minecraft, we can also create similar rockets. Create a basic firework as shown to the right to get started.
$(br2)After you have created this rocket, give it a launch by pointing your cross-hair at the ground, and while holding the item use the action button.

That firework wasn't very exciting, there was no real shape to it. If we add a firework star, we can make the firework appear in different shapes. The Following Firework stars are included in the game, these can be found $(l:https://minecraft.wiki/w/Firework_Star)here.$(/l) $(br2)If we want, we can also add more gunpowder when creating a rocket, to make its flight duration longer.
